updates.update_content:
No one ever expected it to last this long, or that it would be this bad... But the human race is now  entering the second dreadful year of a global pandemic. Our algorithmic overlords attempt to help us cope by spoon-feeding minute by minute sponsored ads in an effort to heal our minds with "retail therapy"... But the relief is temporary.

Blockbuster films and live concerts from our living rooms, the Golden Globes in pajamas, bubble tent breweries, elbow bumps for the rest of your life and even snowstorms in Texas...

It's been a weird and in a million ways awful 2 years since March 2019.  No one could have ever predicted just how weird or awful, and as much as it sucks to say it, we're still not quite out of it yet. I know I don't need to list all the personal ways in which I've been affected by everything over the last 2 years - as I know you have all been affected as well - in some form or another...

Hi everyone, Ben Bishop here.
I hope you are all doing as well as can be with everything going on in the world right now. Writing and drawing books about the apocalypse is way more fun than living in one...
Apologies for the long gap between updates, that’s not how I like to operate, and I’m going to make it a point to bother you all much more often. Hopefully most of you follow me and the book on social media ( , , ) and know that I haven’t disappeared and am still squeezing out as much work every day as I can.

updates.update_userinfo: LAST CALL FOR DRAWING BLOOD VOLUME 2!
updates.update_content: LESS THAN 2 HOURS!

updates.update_userinfo: A BEHIND THE SCENES LOOK AT MY SCRIPTS & DRAWING BLOOD VOLUME 2!
updates.update_content:
Hey there Aggregators!
Ben Bishop here! As some of you know I also draw this other really cool book called DRAWING BLOOD! It's co-created by none other than one of my absolute heroes and biggest inspirations of my whole life... Kevin Eastman, the co-creator of the TEENAGE MUTANT NINJA TURTLES!

updates.update_userinfo: What’s up, what’s up, what’s up?
updates.update_content:
Hey there Aggregate fans. 
Apologies for the lack of big updates lately, I always feel bad for my massive social media spamming during the campaign, so once it ends I figure we all could use a break from the emails! 
But honestly there hasn’t been much to show visually. Although the BOOK 2 script was written when I wrote BOOK 1, it had been a long time since I’d gone back and read through it. So I’m doing so I found a lot of areas I could re-write to make better, or areas where I could actually add in some SPLIT DECISION threads and write those. There’s even a whole new arc that I’ve written that comes from one of the early TO BE CONTINUED endings in BOOK 1 because that particular ending was never actually written! I forgot I had added some stuff WHILE I was drawing the pages, and they never even had a script to go with them. So BOOK 2 is shaping up to be even bigger and longer than I thought it would be.
That’s it!
Good morning! Happy Sunday!

Holy guac! We did it!
The $50K STRETCH GOAL is now UNLOCKED!
This is it folks! Down to less than 24 hours left!

project_data.project_name: THE AGGREGATE BOOK 2 - The Split Decision Comic continues

campaign.story:
My name is Jim Lawson and I'm a comic artist.
I've got some credentials but, unless you're lucky enough to stumble into a regular gig, it's a hard thing in this business to make a go of it. The factors that keep me churning out art and new content is my deep love of the medium and the fans that continue to support me. 
DRAGONFLY
So- I want to talk about some of this aforementioned new content that I have for you here. The first thing that I want to delve into is Dragonfly. Dragonfly is a book that I first published in 2013. A volume was released then using this platform, Kickstarter, as a funding vehicle. Some of you perhaps have that book. Following that, I wrote a second and a third book (neither published) and I abandoned the project with the art only partially done on book 3. 
The first Dragonfly book has a new "repaired" scene.

A few months ago, a fan reached out to me and asked what was up with Dragonfly. I explained that it was unfinished and that I hoped to maybe get back to it someday. That conversation got me thinking however that I should finish the book and wrap up the first story arc, at least. I finished the inking on book 3 and wrote a new conclusion to the first storyline. That collection is what you will find here- books 1, 2, 3 and 4. 
John takes a shot in the second Dragonfly book.
So it's interesting, to me at least. Here is a book that began life 6 years ago, and then lay dormant up until very recently. If you pick this trade paperback, and look at it, everything from book 3, page 10 backwards, is from 2013 or thereabouts and everything beyond that page is new. Don't worry- the art is pretty cohesive, I think, and I can only pick out a few subtle differences myself- I just think it's neat that something could find life again after all that time. 
Dragonfly 3 is them in the world of giant insects.
What is the book about? It's about these characters who find themselves in world with dinosaurs. Each of them are unable to recall anything about their pasts, and one of the overall concepts of the series is their struggle with that. Who are we?- what is real?- what manipulates us? Beyond that backdrop I wanted Dragonfly to be an adventure comic because that's what I love, so there's a lot of action to move the story along and be entertaining hopefully. Last, and somewhat oddly, even to me, was that the book ended up being a little bit about faith 
Ya gotta buy the book to find out what's going on here.
The physical book itself is smaller than standard comic book size- with a final printed size of 6 x 9 inches. It will be a trade paperback, square bound with a softcover and contain 158 pages total of story and black and white art and a final page count of 168 pages. I will leave the back cover blank to allow for original sketches. 
The cover to the Dragonfly trade paperback.
 OK- let's move on. 
HELLRIDE
I began the process of writing and drawing Hellride last fall. I was going through kind of a rough period then, and out of that came this story. 
So yeah, Hellride is about a journey. The ride that the main character is on, is the ride that all share as we travel from birth to death. All of us struggle- we all have trials and we all must face obstacles and there are times when things tend to become overwhelming. Sometimes our stubbornness gets us through, other times it's our determination. Life is not easy, nor is it fair. Accepting these things and finding the strength to go on- that's the story of this book.
Despite this and the sometimes way that darkness appears to prevail, occasionally a light is offered, or reveals itself. I've been there, and I know it happens. Ultimately, that's the message that I'm trying to get across here in this story. It's about strength and hope, and how the two go together. 
OK- enough of the serious stuff, let's talk about the actual book. I remember that when I used to work for the Ninja Turtles, one of my bosses would talk about how he hated black panel borders. I suppose that affected me because up until now, I've never done a book with them. This may seem to be a minor thing to most people, but artistically- this book is kind of a watershed work for me.
As well as the border thing, this book uses tons of full page bleeds. Once again, totally new to me and, I think, sets Hellride apart from other comics in my portfolio. Also- mostly from a visual standpoint, I've really made an effort to try different techniques and approaches with the layouts and page designs. I know, I know- it's just a comic but I really made an effort to make it interesting, or at least memorable. 
Hellride is going to be a smaller format comic. The physical book will measure 6 x 8 inches. The final page count of the comic will be 68 pages. 
Hellride cover.
STRETCH GOAL
If I can break the $6,000.00 mark I will include a signed Dragonfly print. It will be full color and measure an unobtrusive 8.5 x 11 inches. 
The print will automatically be included in all reward levels that include either physical book ($15.00 and up). 
The Dragonfly stretch goal print.
Hellride original art reward 1 image. Art measures 9 1/2 x 12 5/8 inches.
Hellride original art pack 2 image. Art measures 11 1/4 x 15 1/8 inches.
Dragonfly original art reward 1. Image measures 11 x 14 inches.
Dragonfly original art reward B. This art appears on the cover to The Complete Dragonfly TPB. the image measures 8 1/8 x 12 inches.
Dragonfly original art reward C. This is the black and white image used for the stretch goal print. The art measures 11 x 14 inches.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my fifth Kickstarter, so I think I have a realistic expectation about finishing up the work that's left and what's required when it comes to fulfilling the rewards. It's a lot of work, but hopefully backers will be assured that I'm diligent and aware that when folks support you, there is a contract made between the two parties that you will deliver their stuff as promised.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: The Dragonfly property.
support.descp:
I don't think I've ever seen this before- the chance to buy an actual intellectual property here on Kickstarter but that is what I am offering. For the sum I'm asking, I will sign over the ownership to Dragonfly. All the rights will belong to you and as well you will have the ability to reprint the book, or sell it to The Cartoon Network or whomever. In my opinion, there's a lot of opportunity for building and expansion here. For the right person, it might be a cool thing.
But truthfully, I'm just really curious if someone out there might actually do this.
Please know that this does not come with all the original art that I've done for the series. That remains mine.

updates.update_content:
Hey everybody- I'm reaching out to you today, making the news and spreading the word that I have a new Kickstarter campaign running (right now). As backers of my last KS it pretty much seemed a no-brainer that you as former supporters might want to be aware of this. The project is ready, the work is done and all I need now is the cash to make this project actually happen. 
The cool thing this time around is that the book(s) are now in color. It's a new thing for me- I've never before self-published a book that hasn't been black and white. Getting this thing done was a big lift, and it literally took years, but now it's here and I think that you'll gree that the wait was worth it.

The Hellride books are on their way. After a little delay, I’ve had word that they will be here on Thursday, the 20th. The Dragonflys are here, and I’ve been slowly cracking out the back cover sketches for the people that have asked for those. These sketches I’ve been having a lot of fun doing, and I have been posting those up on my Facebook page. 
Although I have some rewards ready to be mailed, I haven’t. That’s because I’ve felt like it wasn’t really fair to all the backers and I wanted to begin the mailings all together. Those packages will begin to go out a soon as I get my hands on the Hellrides in a few days. Also, the digital reward people will get their comics at the end of the week.

So- I have an update on Hellride. 
I contacted the printer yesterday in order to find out what's up with the books. Apparently, they are in the country, but are being held up at the port under something known as an exception, which means they're not releasing them, for what reason they (the printers) don't know why. 
However, UPS has given a delivery date of June 20th.

So here’s a little update.
First, some good news. The Dragonfly books arrived here at the studio the day before yesterday. The book looks wonderful and does appear exactly as I hoped for, with the exception of one little thing.
So here it is. On the DFLY book, the back cover is blank- the intention being there, that it is open and available for sketches. This, early on, I explained to the printer what my needs were (I needed to be able to ink on this thing) and they replied that the cover coating was required- in order to protect the ink on the front. What they would do though, is dilute or through some process lessen the amount of coating in order to allow me to sketch on the back with no problem. When the books got here, the first thing I did was to play around with a few experimental drawings. It wasn't as I hoped- my pens smeared and the ink wouldn’t dry- no good. Luckily, my art markers (colors) worked fine and they seemed to dry and I’m happy with that- cause if they didn’t that would've been bad. Sharpies work too- but not before the color- color must go down first.

Remember back in the Winter when you backed the Dragonfly/ Hellride Kickstarter? Well, I'm here to give you a little update. 
I had a little bit of fun getting the books assembled for printing. Much thanks have to go to Dan Berger (my fellow studio-mate) for the massive assist getting all the DFLY files together and ready. It was process with all the bleeds in Hellride to get all the art placed correctly and I'm sure the printer guys were pulling their hair out by the time the proof got approved but it's all good now.

Hey Everybody--
I just wanted to let you know that I'm in the process of doing the pre-production work that is basically preparing the books for the printer. It's not glamorous.
I'll keep you all updated on how things are going.
Jim

Hi Backers- this is copied from my Jim Lawson Art Facebook page:
The Kickstarter for Dragonfly and Hellride wrapped up last night. I’ve done 5 now, and this guy pretty much blew away all the others. I have a lot to be thankful for- all the backers, both old and new who came along for the ride, folks who shared my posts and helped get the word out and a special shout out to Ben Bishop, who teamed up with me to produce a jam drawing which seriously helped promote both campaigns (I know mine jumped).
I want to say thanks to everybody. Comics are absolutely the only thing I want to do. Without the fans and friends who support me and other projects like this, there would certainly be less art in the world, and that would suck. You guys are the best.

Hey Backers- this newsworthy thing is copied and pasted from my JimLawsonArt Facebook page. 
OK- let me see if I can explain this. Right now, Turtle brothers, Ben Bishop and I both have Kickstarters running. Normally, this might not be such a good thing, however he and I thought we might take this lemon and make it into lemonade. We came up with this idea to see if we might be able to help each other by doing a jam drawing and raffling it to some lucky winner. The winner will qualify by doing these 3 things:
1) Back both projects. No explanation needed- links below
2) Share both projects. This will require 2 separate shares.
3) Comment on a specific post that they did. From this comment list we will pull a winner. There will be an official post created where you can do this- it's not there yet so please consider this just the announcement.

The campaign has done pretty amazing, so far. It's been just over a week and my expectations have been surpassed. I've run 5 Kickstarters and this one has exceeded all the others- if you just look at the amount raised along with the time it took to reach its goal.
Thanks to all- it's you that allow me to do this thing that I love. I hope that you'll continue to follow the campaign's progress and continue to spread the word in the weeks remaining. 
Onwards!

campaign.story:
Welcome to the House of Fear
I'm back on Kickstarter to bring you two more comics packed with all the adventure and monster-fighting action you've come to expect from the House of Fear series of complete, stand-alone comics for kids and adults.
In House of Fear: Teeth, young Mylie steals her brother's tooth from under his pillow, and the Tooth Fairy isn't pleased. When the evil witch seeks her revenge, Mylie must fight the aging sorceress or risk losing all of her teeth forever.
In House of Fear: Dead Lake, four boys head out on their first solo camping adventure. It turns ugly fast when they uncover the truth: there's a monster terrorizing the campground. 
Two Comics for Twice the Thrills 
Here's what you can expect when you back the two latest issues from the House of Fear series:
Two complete, stand-alone stories. 
68 pages of spooky thrills.
Scares suitable for kids 7 and older.* 
Offset printing for the best quality.
Bagged/boarded comics shipped in sturdy envelopes for added protection.
Each issue features bonus pages not to be collected elsewhere. 
*Note: The themes and action in these issues are suitable for all ages, but the level of dialog might slow down early readers who are just beginning to read on their own. Otherwise I would label these as "all ages."
You'll Enjoy These Comics...Guaranteed! 
If you back the printed version and dislike the comics for any reason, return them for a refund (minus shipping fees).
Horror Talk Review of Teeth! 
Check out the review of House of Fear: Teeth on HorrorTalk.
Fortress of Dorkness Review!
Check out the Beyond the Big Two video review by Christian Villarreal and The Fortress of Dorkness.
Just Announced: The Dark Horse Collected Edition
In May 2019, Dark Horse Comics is publishing a collected volume of House of Fear comics. The book will feature five complete spooky stories. That's 144-pages of kids vs. monsters.
How Scary Are these Comics? 
I don't expect anyone to have nightmares from an issue of House of Fear. These stories are intended for kids, and while they have scary elements, they're closer to action/adventure stories than true horror. My goal with these comics is to let kids test their fears through fiction, and to do so in a fun, exciting way.
That's not to say that these are totally calm and peaceful either. With each issue, I try to add a scene that gives the story an edge. I want young readers to be so thrilled, that they want to come back for more. 
House of Fear in Schools
In addition to writing comics for kids, I also enjoy talking to students about how comics are made and how stories shape our lives... even crazy monster stories. For the last two years, I've traveled to local schools to talk about creating comics. It never ceases to amaze me how excited kids get when they realize that someone actually writes and draws comics, and that they can do it, too.
But you can't talk about comics without handing out a copy when you're done, right? That's why, every time I step into a classroom, I bring a stack of House of Fear comics to hand out to the students. Doing so solidifies the discussion in their minds, and (hopefully) keeps them motivated to try creating their own comic.
With every comic purchased during this Kickstarter campaign, I'll print an extra copy to hand out to a student in one of my sessions in 2019. I've even created a Classroom Ambassador reward tier for those interested in supplying a stack of comics for an entire classroom. 
Meet the Creators
Our two new House of Fear comics were brought to you by a team of talented, passionate creators...
James Powell - The Writer - Creator of House of Fear, James has written and edited comics for various publishers, including Dark Horse Comics, Image Comics, and Red Stylo Media. He is currently wrapping up his first novel for middle grade readers, tentatively titled, Santa's Claws. 
Jethro Morales - The Penciler - Jethro started in comics back in 2009 and has been working his way up in line with the big league artists and has solidified his skills along the way by taking on popular titles like Vampirella, Dejah Thoris, and Green Hornet. And now here on House of Fear!
Mike Erandio - The Inker -  A comic veteran who’s been in the local comic scene in the Philippines since the 80s, Mike now works alongside Jethro as inker for the House of Fear series. He brings a decade of honed inking skills.
James Hislope - Boyle Intro/Afterword Artist - James is an illustrator, cartoonist, and caricature artist who also happens to have a knack for drawing comics.
Josh Jensen - The Colorist - Living colors from Tokyo, Japan. Josh is the colorist for all six issues of House of Fear. Check him out on Twitter.
Matt Krotzer - The Designer and Letterer - Matt gives voices to characters and sound to action. His stellar lettering work has been seen in the pages of Image, Dark Horse, and many fine independent comics around the world.
You can find more information about previous House of Fear issues and their creators by checking out the previous Kickstarter campaigns:  The Curse of Cottonwood Ct. and The Grumpledowns Gang and the Case of the Mail-Order Shoggoths. 
Preview Pages 
Below are the first 8 pages from House of Fear: Teeth. Want more? Check out the 9-page preview of House of Fear: Dead Lake.
Why Kickstarter?
I'm coming to Kickstarter to raise funds for an offset print run of 1000 copies for each of theses two issues. Printing offset means buying in bulk, which is costly, but doing so ensures the highest quality possible. It also reduces my costs per issue, which helps turn a profit at conventions or with online sales. Increased profits means I get to make more comics! 
By using Kickstarter, I also can reach more people than I could by any other means. I want to get these comics into as many hands as possible so kids around the world can discover the joy of testing their fears through fiction.
Where do the Funds Go?  
The funds we earn through Kickstarter will be used to print the comics ($3500), ship the rewards to backers ($2000), and pay Kickstarter ($500) for hosting the campaign.  
Any extra money earned from the campaign will help pay for future issues of House of Fear.
The Rewards
Will You Help Us Continue Making Comics for Kids?  
It's simple: I want to make comics and get them to as many kids as I possibly can. I can't do that without the support from readers like you.
Thank you for checking out my latest project. Please back the campaign and help me continue making exciting, action-packed comics for kids. 
With gratitude, James and the entire House of Fear team.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I've done everything I can to minimize risk for backers. Both comics are 100% complete, and the printer is waiting for the files to get the presses running.

There is always the chance that printing delays will get in the way of intended delivery dates, but I am committed to having the book and other rewards in your hands by the time listed in the reward description.

This is my third Kickstarter campaign. Back with confidence.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Less than 2 days remain in our latest campaign
updates.update_content:
With 35 hours remaining, we crossed the 200-backer mark on our latest House of Fear campaign, which means every backer gets a PDF of the black & white version of our backup tale, The Trees Have Eyes. 
If we get 225 backers, the deluxe digital edition gets an upgrade to a full making-of book. 
The campaign is almost over, but there's still time to secure the cool variant cover, the rare cover (limited to only 31 copies), and the Boyle minifig.

updates.update_userinfo: House of Fear #7 is live and moving closer to funded!
updates.update_content:
We're at the midpoint in our latest House of Fear campaign, and we're sitting at 88% funded. Once we reach 90% mark ($4050), Kickstarter is likely to give us the extra promotional push to help us get to full funding.
If you're thinking about backing, consider doing so now to help give us that extra push. 
So, what's cool about this campaign other than the book itself and the cool covers? Well, we've got our first exclusive, crossover print:

updates.update_userinfo: Coming Soon: House of Fear - Rubber & Glue
updates.update_content:
We're putting the final touches on the seventh issue of House of Fear, and I'm excited to announce that we're launching our next campaign on March 9. 
House of Fear: Rubber & Glue is a 33-page issue featuring two complete stories that feature bullies, curses, and a forest of evil eyes and demented trees.
Click here to be notified when we launch.

updates.update_userinfo: Final Hours for Our Latest Campaign
updates.update_content: We're in the final hours for the House of Fear Quickstarter campaign. We have a couple of Black Friday deals going on, and we've just reached 100 backers, which means everyone receives a digital book that provides an extensive look at the making of the latest issue.

updates.update_userinfo: Our next House of Fear prelaunch page
updates.update_content:
We're about ready to launch our next House of Fear campaign. It'll be a short Quickstarter (only 12 days) that re-introduces the series to fans and gets the ball rolling on creating more issues. 
There's a cool little prelaunch page set up, too:

Hey there,
I'm happy to announce that the next series of stories from the House of Fear are well on their way to being finalized. I've been keeping Jethro, James, Josh, and Matt busy lately, and for our next campaign, we'll have at least three stories in two issues. 
Check out the cover art samples in various stages of production. I've even asked James Hislope to create the first House of Fear variant cover. I can't wait to share that with you, too.

I sort of fell off the face of the world for a while, but I'm back to share an update... 
Giving Back
One of the most important reasons for running a Kickstarter campaign and printing House of Fear comics has always been to share comics with kids. To set up classroom discussions to show students how comics are made, and to inspire them to make their own. At the end of each session, I give students a copy of a comic, which helps solidify their interest.

updates.update_userinfo: In Comic Shops Now: The House of Fear Collection
updates.update_content:
The first Dark Horse collection of House of Fear comics is out in comic shops today. It never would have happened without your support.
Making comics is a ton of fun, but it's also a lot of work. And I never would have made it this far without your encouragement.
I can't say thank you enough.

Just a quick update to say that you should have received your House of Fear comics by now. I hope you enjoyed the latest issues. 
If you filled out a survey but still haven't received your comics, please let me know. I have tracking info for each shipment, so I can look into it fairly quickly.
What's Next?

Good news: I've begun to ship out the House of Fear rewards. Based on the manifest, I managed to ship 57 packages within 24 hours of receiving copies of Dead Lake (what can I say, I don't sleep much). 
Judging by the stack of boxes next to me, I'd say I'm about halfway through fulfillment. If I can do another marathon packaging and labeling event tonight, I should have them all out by Friday afternoon.

project_data.project_name: House of Fear: Two new scary comics for kids and adults

campaign.story:
My name is Mary Bellamy. I'm a professional comic book creator and licensed artist who has worked on properties like My Little Pony, Womanthology, Monsters and Other Scary Sh*t, Marvel, DC Comics, Adventure Time, Rick and Morty and many more. I also exhibit at San Diego Comic Con as Zorilita - Mary Bellamy, an independent publisher specializing in pro-girl graphic novels.
After producing over 12 full-color, graphic novels and a plush doll line, the Zorilita Guardians, I moved into buttons and stickers! After funding my last campaign I decided I would love to do more enamel pins!
I'm most known for my two series Ah Heck!! The Angel Chronicles and Faux Facts - The Truth Can Be Strange! and Cosmic Cupcake Chaos! With my previous Kickstarter I funded two designs featuring evil bunnies and sassy cucpakes. This time around I want to fund some funny and inspirational enamel pins based on Faux Facts and Ah Heck!! as well as try again for the Magical Wand pin from Cosmic Cupcake Chaos.
This campaign will start by financing 2 pins (50 each) first and then move on to stretch goals.
They willl be:
Approximately 1.5 inch
Hard Enamel
Black Nickel Plating
Butterfly Clutch
Backing Card Packing
Magical By Nature!
1.5 inch hard enamel pin
I believe all girls are magical by nature and Sioux from Cosmic Cupcake Chaos has to use her magic to fight sentient evil cupcakes.
Not Today, Anxiety!
1.5 inch hard enamel pin
Who has anxiety? This pin features Retta, of Faux Facts whose battle with anxiety is pretty literal. Her anxiety comes alive causing hi-jinks.
$600
Fight The Power! UNLOCKED!!!
1.5 inch hard enamel pin
We're all warriors inside and Providence is no exception. She's a strong willed digital Robin Hood who seeks to fight the power!
 $900
"God is a Woman!"
1.5 inch hard enamel pin
God in Ah Heck!! is a woman and I wanted to represent God as a woman because you don't see it very often in popular media.
$1100
I've Got This!
1.5 inch hard enamel pin
This pin features the strong willed Rosemary from Faux Facts. For the girl that can do it all despite all the insanity and still has heart.
$1300
Not Just A Pretty Face
1.5 inch hard enamel pin
This pin features the lovely Chastity a girl who's not just a pretty face but far more than she seems.
$1500
The Truth Is Out There
1.5 inch hard enamel pin
Bring out your inner conspirasict. This pin features the quirky Amber, a girl who's determined to prove conspiracies including aliens.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While I have been assured that production will only take a few weeks there could always be unforeseen delays with shipping but I will keep you all in the loop. I am hand packing and shipping these myself but a few hundred pins should not take too long. All stickers have already been printed, I have all the comics and dolls and extra pins for orders so there will be no delay on those either.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
I've sent the surveys this morning. If we haven't already spoken about any special circumstances please let me know if there are any via message. I'm leaving addresses changeable for the time being just in case for all tiers except art cards as those I can finish very quickly. Everything else is still on track. I am just waiting for the funds to clear which I believe should be Thursday. Then I'll place the order and we wait.
Thanks guys!

campaign.story:
The more we raise through the Super Kickstarter!, the more new Aquabats music and Super Show mini-episodes you'll get!!!
And during our FINAL COUNTDOWN LIVESTREAM, we smashed through our $600,000 stretch goal, unlocking ALL of this:
And here's what that means... 
UPDATE: We reached our first goal in under 30 minutes, which means...
Next year, The Aquabats will write and record a BRAND NEW ALBUM.. our first since Hi-Five Soup in 2011!
It also means we'll have NEW SONGS to play next year, so we can celebrate in your town when we hit the road for our THE AQUABATS! 25TH ANNIVERSARY TOUR!
UPDATE: We reached our second goal in under four hours, so...
The Aquabats will also make at least six NEW MINI-EPISODES of The Aquabats! Super Show!, and release them online! 
UPDATE: We reached our third goal in the final week, which means...
Now The Aquabats will make at least TWELVE NEW MINI-EPISODES – enough to have new episodes every month for a year! – and release a LIVE CONCERT ALBUM!
The concert album will be from April 2018's epic The Fury of the Aquabats: 20th Anniversary show at the Fonda Theater, which brought back Catboy, Chainsaw, Prince Adam, Baron Von Tito and more for an insane reunion!  And... 
All backers at the $35 PLEDGE LEVEL AND ABOVE now get the live concert as a FREE DOWNLOAD!
UPDATE: We reached our fourth goal during our FINAL COUNTDOWN livestream on September 29th, which means...
The Aquabats will be able to record TWO BRAND NEW ALBUMS in 2019... and all backers at the $55 PLEDGE LEVEL and above will get the extra album, before it comes out, as a FREE DOWNLOAD!
So you see, Oh Righteous Comrades, it's up to you to decide: does the world still need The Aquabats? The answer – and how much cool new stuff The Aquabats can make – is up to you!
Looking for our original stretch goals? 
Our original plans for more stretch goals also included a LIVE CONCERT FILM (at $750,000), a PRIVATE LIVESTREAM CONCERT for backers (at $1,000,000), and up to a year of weekly online episodes! We changed it up because you requested more new music, but we're not giving up on the other goals! Keep checking our UPDATES PAGE after the campaign, and we'll tell you what's next.
When you pledge, you'll get all kinds of super rad, exclusive rewards. 
See for yourself!
PLUS, all kinds of SPECIAL REWARDS and ONCE-IN-A-LIFETIME OPPORTUNITIES!
And don't forget, you can also get all kinds of extra rewards and exclusive items in our official ADD-ON REWARD STORE, including one of our most requested rewards:
CHECK OUT THESE REWARD DESIGNS:
                No problem, new friend! Start by watching this quick video: 
Awesome, right?! You can also...
LISTEN to a bunch of our songs and albums! 
WATCH some full episodes of The Aquabats! Super Show! 
Some professional TV-watching people really liked our show too:
In fact, believe it or not...
There are a MILLION ways to help the Super Kickstarter succeed, and get the world that much closer to having a brand-new Aquabats album and more Super Show! mini-episodes. 
SEE THE FULL LIST!
Or, here are some easy ways to help right now:
PLEDGE NOW!
Even if you change your pledge later, it helps to have as many Righteous Comrades as possible! Plus, you aren't charged anything until we meet our goal AND the campaign ends!

FOLLOW US! 
We're @TheAquabats on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and YouTube!
TELL OTHER PEOPLE! 
If you love The Aquabats and think you might know other people who would too, now's the perfect time to get them into it!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This won't work, and no one actually likes The Aquabats...?

Also, even though we know we've got friends all over the world, it's always possible that we won't be able to reach enough of them before this Kickstarter ends. But, if we reach our minimum goal, we'll be able to keep raising more funds AFTER the Kickstarter ends, which will give us time to reach more old friends!

But, as long as the Kickstarter succeeds, we've GOT THIS! We've made albums before, and we know how to do it again. We also have made two seasons of Super Show, and just made a new mini-season for this Kickstarter, so we know we can make some great new episodes for you, even on a tight budget!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.descp:
You probably think this song is about you, don’t you?
Well… that’s up to you, homie! At this level, The Aquabats will WRITE AND RECORD AN ORIGINAL SONG FOR YOU**. You can choose the topic, help write the music, and even perform on the track with us! Or, give us some direction and then let us do the heavy lifting. It’s up to you!
Then, come VISIT THE RECORDING STUDIO*** while The Aquabats record your song, and get the MASTER COPY. Want to keep it for yourself? You can! Want us to share it with the rest of the Legion? Right on! It’s YOUR song, so it’s up to you!
Plus, you’ll get everything in the $10, 25, 35, 55, 75, 100, 150, 200, 250, 300 and 350 Pledge Levels!
*SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED.
You’ll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends! See FAQs for details + estimated shipping costs.
**FOR NON-COMMERCIAL USE ONLY.
Not to kill the buzz, but this reward is for personal use only, not for getting rich by selling a new Aquabats single! If you want to use the track for commercial purposes, please check with us before making your pledge. See the FAQ for more details!
***SESSION TIMING TBD.
We expect to record your song in Southern California, and plan to schedule your studio visit for early 2019. You’ll get at least 1 month notice before your studio visit. Travel & accommodations not included.
INCLUDES:
We Record a New Song JUST FOR YOU!*
A VIP STUDIO VISIT! (See Us Record Your Song!)
VIP Access to Every Aquabats Show in 2019!
Everything in the $350 Pledge Level!

support.title: PRIVATE AQUABATS CONCERT!
support.descp:
Tired of waiting for The Aquabats to come to YOUR town?
At this level, The Aquabats will come to you** and PLAY A PRIVATE PARTY OR CONCERT, just for you and your guests!*** Want five awesome superheroes at your wedding, birthday bash or pool party? No problem. Want to book a venue in your town and arrange a private show for 100 of your closest friends? Consider it done. You can even decide what goes on the set list!
Plus, you’ll get everything in the $10, 25, 35, 55, 75, 100, 150, 200, 250, 300 and 350 Pledge Levels AND a PERSONALIZED VIDEO MESSAGE from the MC Bat Commander to help get your friends PUMPED for your private show!
*SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED.
You’ll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends! See FAQs for details + estimated shipping costs.
**Depending on your location, there may be additional charges to cover the cost of travel and accommodations. We’ll coordinate with you to figure out the details after the campaign ends.
***There are a few terms and conditions on this one, so be sure to check out the FAQ before pledging for this reward.
INCLUDES:
Aquabats Play A PRIVATE CONCERT For You!*
Personalized VIDEO MESSAGE!*
Everything in the $350 Pledge Level!

support.title: BE OUR EXECUTIVE PRODUCER!
support.descp:
Time to throw your weight around, boss.
At this level, The Aquabats will make you an official EXECUTIVE PRODUCER for the ENTIRE YEAR OF ONLINE EPISODES! The number of episodes will be determined based on how much the Kickstarter campaign raises, but could be anywhere from 6 to 60 – and your name will be on all of them, and on the NEW ALBUM!
You’ll be listed as EXECUTIVE PRODUCER in the credits of each episode, on IMDB, and on the OFFICIAL POSTER reward. You’ll also get a VIP SET VISIT FOR 2,** which includes a PRIVATE TOUR, LUNCH WITH THE AQUABATS, and all kinds of high-powered executive perks, like a Director’s Chair with your name on it!
Plus, you’ll get everything in the $10, 25, 35, 55, 75, 100, 150, 200, 250, 300 and 350 Pledge Levels!
*SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED.
You’ll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends! See FAQs for details + estimated shipping costs.
**SHOOT TIMING TBD.
We expect to shoot most episodes in Utah, and will aim to schedule your set visit for Spring 2019. You’ll get at least 2 months notice before your set visit. Travel & accommodations not included
INCLUDES:
Everything in the $350 Pledge Level!
EP Credit on All New Episodes!*
EP Credit on the New Album!
2× VIP On Set Experience*
VIP Access to Every Aquabats Show in 2019!

support.title: IT'S *YOUR* EPISODE!
support.descp:
Ready to get creative?
At this level, you’ll COLLABORATE WITH THE AQUABATS to MAKE A NEW ONLINE EPISODE!** You’ll work with our team to write a script based on whatever insane ideas you suggest, then team up with director and show co-creators Jason deVilliers and Christian Jacobs in any role you want! Once the script is worked out, you’ll join The Aquabats on set to produce and shoot YOUR EPISODE… and when it’s done, it’ll be included as part of our online season!
We’ll even throw a SUPER RAD SCREENING PARTY to celebrate at the end of production, so that you and your friends will be the first to see your masterpiece.
Plus, you’ll get everything in the $10, 25, 35, 55, 75, 100, 150, 200, 250, 300 and 350 Pledge Levels!
*SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED.
You’ll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends! See FAQs for details + estimated shipping costs.
**This is a complicated one. If you're even a little bit serious about this, go check the FAQs for more details. Specific length and details of the episode will be worked out between you and The Aquabats. You'll get to decide how we use the budget for your episode! See the FAQ for more details.
INCLUDES:
We Create A NEW EPISODE Just For You!*
VIP Access to Every Aquabats Show in 2019!
Everything in the $350 Pledge Level!

support.title: The AQUABATS FUN DAY!
support.descp:
Want a day to remember? At this level, you'll bring up to 3 friends along as The Aquabats take you out for A DAY OF ADVENTURE IN SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA!*
Want to race Ricky Fitness, go putting with Jimmy The Robot, or take the mic from the MC Bat Commander? Now you can!
The Aquabats will pick your group up in the Battletram, and you'll choose between fun activities** like karaoke, go-karting and mini-golf… and, of course, a pizza party. Then, you'll sit with The Aquabats in traffic on one of the world's most congested freeways and breathe some of the most polluted air in the world! When in Rome...
*We'll arrange a date that works for you and your guests. Travel & accommodations not included. **P.S. We could get REALLY crazy and go horseback riding, but that's up to you!
PLUS... You'll get all of the rewards and benefits included in the $350 pledge level!
SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping of any/all physical rewards after the campaign ends. See the FAQs for more details and estimated shipping costs!
INCLUDES:
A Day With The Aquabats!
A Ride in the Battletram!
Everything in the $350 Pledge Level!

support.title: SPONSOR AN EPISODE!
support.descp:
Small Business Owners & Brands of Earth… this one’s for you!
At this level, you’ll be the PRESENTING SPONSOR for a NEW ONLINE EPISODE.** You’ll be featured in the credits on the episode and on IMDB, and The Aquabats will work with you to create a CUSTOM VIDEO AD that will air as part of your episode, so that Aquabats fans everywhere know you stepped up to #BringBackTheAquabats!
We’ll also give you some extra SPONSOR BENEFITS, like a sign to hang in your business that lets your customers know you sponsored the Awesomest Band in the World. Think how grateful they’ll be!
Plus, you’ll get everything in the $10, 25, 35, 55, 75, 100, 150, 200, 250, 300 and 350 Pledge Levels!
*SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED.
You’ll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends! See FAQs for details + estimated shipping costs.
**The Aquabats reserve the right to refuse requests and brands that are inappropriate, offensive or divisive. See FAQs for more details, and get in touch if you’re interested in pledging for this reward!
INCLUDES:
The Aquabats Make Your Business A CUSTOM AD!*
Ad Appears In Your Sponsored Episode!*
PRESENTING SPONSOR Credit on a New Episode!
Special SUPER SPONSOR Benefits & Sign!

support.title: BE OUR PRIME MINISTER!
support.descp:
This is it. The end of the line.
At this level, you'll be APPOINTED AS THE HONORARY PRIME MINISTER of The Aquabats' lost homeland of Aquabania.
If this Kickstarter campaign reaches our DREAM GOAL of $10,000,000, we will then buy an actual island, have it designated as Aquabania, and you will be appointed as the Prime Minister of our sovereign island nation for the first term. (After that, you'll need to win the election, because, you know, democracy.)
And, even if we DON'T raise enough to buy an island and make it our homeland, you'll still get all of the benefits of the EXECUTIVE PRODUCER pledge level, and will be given a recurring role in our online SUPER SHOW episodes as The Prime Minister of Aquabania.**
You'll also have VIP access during every single Aquabats concert in 2019 – as long as you can get there, you'll be on the list, and you'll have backstage access to hang out with The Aquabats.
Plus, you’ll get everything in the $10, 25, 35, 55, 75, 100, 150, 200, 250, 300 and 350 Pledge Levels!
*SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED.
You’ll be charged for shipping after the campaign ends! See FAQs for details + estimated shipping costs.
**SHOOT TIMING TBD.
We expect to shoot most episodes in Utah, and will aim to schedule your set visit for Spring 2019. You’ll get at least 2 months notice before your set visit. Travel & accommodations not included
INCLUDES:
Be Appointed As PRIME MINISTER of Aquabania!
Recurring Role on SUPER SHOW as Prime Minister!
EP Credit on All New Episodes!*
VIP Access to Every Aquabats Show in 2019!
Everything in the $350 Pledge Level!

campaign.story:
AUG 22: We take on Powdered Milk Man in EPISODE 6!
AUG 14: We've found EagleBones, in EPISODE 5!
AUG 13: Jimmy The Robot RETURNS: it's EPISODE 4!
AUG 10: We've got TWO T-SHIRT DESIGNS!
AUG 8: Ooo oooh! We've released EPISODE 3!
AUG 6: New rewards for MUSIC LOVERS! ($44 + $100 + $160)
AUG 4: We've released Super Kickstarter: EPISODE 2!
AUG 3: Our director explains WHY OUR GOAL is $1.1M 
No problem-o, friend! Start by watching this quick video:
Awesome, right?! You can also:
Listen to a bunch of The Aquabats' songs!
Check out some full episodes of The Aquabats! Super Show!
Watch this great review that breaks it all down for you.
Read what critics have said about The Aquabats:
When you join the Legion of Righteous Comrades, the most important thing you'll get is a warm sense of satisfaction, knowing you've helped bring back The Aquabats, and made the world a safer, goofier place for the kids.
We'll also add more SUPER RAD, EXCLUSIVE REWARDS all month, including:
We'll also finally be able to release LONG-AWAITED CONTENT, including:
We'll offer some ONCE-IN-A-LIFETIME EXPERIENCES, like...
We're even prepared to do the UNTHINKABLE, and…
We said it and we meant it: this isn't just about raising funds. It's also about bringing together the most awesome, most rad, most cray-cray CROWD the world has ever seen -- the Legion of Righteous Comrades! -- to send a message that the world is ready for the return of The Aquabats.
So, whether you're able to contribute $5 or $5000, there's still a place for you in the Legion… and there are lots of ways to get involved, help the cause, and earn exclusive secret rewards!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Turns out, there were a lot of RISKS & CHALLENGES to our Super Kickstarter. In fact, some of our old arch-enemies, like Silver Skull, even tried to ruin our campaign. But we've learned a lot, thanks to the help of The Legion of Righteous Comrades, and we've relaunched a new and improved version of this Kickstarter at bringbacktheaquabats.com!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: The LONG-TIME LISTENER! (Vol. 1!)
support.descp:
STANDALONE REWARD.
So, you've been listening to The Aquabats and catching their shows since BEFORE it was cool? Love their music, but not big on the idiot box? You asked for a pledge package that's ALL ABOUT THE MUSIC, and The Aquabats are here to deliver.
With this package, you'll get ALL OF THE DIGITAL MUSIC REWARDS, including the brand-new "GREATEST HITS" album, the never-released "SUPER SHOW: SEASON 1 SOUNDTRACK" (with 37 full-length tracks), and ANY NEW MUSIC that The Aquabats create from this Kickstarter! That means AT LEAST 4 new discs worth of new and unreleased tracks!
PLUS... we'll also throw in a lot of digital goodies, like a Special Thanks on TheAquabats.com and Twitter, exclusive Legion Updates from The Aquabats, exclusive wallpapers and ringtones, and some other surprises. You'll NEVER STOP LISTENING AGAIN!!!
OR... Want all of the music rewards AND the television show? Check out "The TOTAL DIGITAL AWESOMENESS" package ($88).
OR... Serious about music and need everything on CD or VINYL, not just DIGITAL DOWNLOADS? You got it, homie: to get it all on SPECIAL EDITION CDs, upgrade to the "VOLUME 2" package ($100). For SIGNED SPECIAL EDITION VINYL, check out "VOLUME 3" ($160).
STANDALONE REWARD. Not included with other reward levels, and doesn't include other reward levels. It's a lone wolf. AWWOOOO!!!
INCLUDES:
The New Aquabats! Album(s)! (download)
"Super Show: Season 1" Soundtrack! (download)
The Aquabats! Greatest Hits (album download)
Kickstarter Exclusive: Wallpapers & Ringtones
Special Thanks on Twitter!
Special Thanks on TheAquabats.com!
Legion Membership Kit (Digital)

What you WILL get is a ton of music and television, OLD AND NEW, The Aquabats' forever gratitude, and a bunch of super rad digital goodies! WHAT THE WHAAAA??!

support.title: The "STRAIGHT TO VOICEMAIL!"
support.descp:
What if you wanted the Aquabats to make a personalized voicemail greeting for your smartphone or your stoopid-fone?? Well, say no more! Your time has come! You can have one or ALL of the Aquabats record something wonderful to leave as your PERSONALIZED VOICEMAIL GREETING!
That’s right! THE AQUABATS will record a message of your choosing,* lasting up to 30 seconds, and then send you an audio file! It’s that easy!! WOWEE ZOWEE!!
*Not to kill the buzz, but this is for personal use only. We can't just record the next radio ad for your company. For that sort of hoo-hah, get in touch to talk about SPONSORSHIP OPTIONS! See FAQ for more details.
PLUS... You'll get all of the rewards and benefits included in the $300 pledge level!
SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping of any/all physical rewards after the campaign ends. See the FAQs for more details and estimated shipping costs!
INCLUDES:
Everything in the $300 Pledge Level!
Personalized Voicemail Greeting (up to 30 sec)

support.descp:

Well… Remember now! Because it’s finally real!! Have the Aquabats record a PERSONALIZED VIDEO GREETING for you!*
Your video can be up to 45 seconds, and can feature one Bat, two Bats or all the Bats! It’s your choice!! DO IT!! WHY NOT??
*Remember when this was for personal use only? Yeah, well... that’s right now too. Your video is for personal use only. If you were hoping to have The Aquabats record the next television or YouTube ad for your company... great! Get in touch about SPONSORSHIP OPTIONS.

Or, to bring your favorite Aquabat-loving son or daughter to join you on set, as you stampede through the background and almost get eaten by Land Sharks or a Giant Potato Bug? Now you won't *have* to imagine! At this level, you and a guest will APPEAR IN A BRAND NEW EPISODE OF "THE AQUABATS! SUPER SHOW!" as TWO FEATURED EXTRAS!* Have lunch on set with the cast and crew, see how the show gets made, and have plenty of time for pictures with The Aquabats and the Battletram.

You and your guests will be picked up in the BattleTram at a mutually agreed rendezvous, blind-folded and then transported to the secret headquarters that only legends foretell of. See the vintage blacklight poster room, walk through the BattleTram garage, see ancient relics, toys and collectables from around the world. See storage and junk that we should have thrown away years ago. But, most important, swear to protect the secret location of our heroes' HQ!

support.title: The HOLLYWOOD HEAVYWEIGHT!
support.descp:
Welcome to Hollywood! At this level, you'll BE OUR PRODUCER on a brand new episode of THE AQUABATS! SUPER SHOW!
In the Spring/Summer of 2019, you and a guest of your choice will fly out to wherever we are shooting the show for a VIP SET TOUR,* lunch with the cast, and more high-powered producer perks… like red licorice, and all the Goldfish™ crackers you can eat!**
While on set, you'll sit in your own PERSONALIZED DIRECTOR'S CHAIR while you watch us shoot an entire episode! As a producer, you'll eat snacks, drink sugary drinks, gain weight, and throw it around!
We'll then list you as a KICKSTARTER PRODUCER*** in the EPISODE CREDITS and on IMDB! (MONEY BUCKETS!)
We'll even throw in two VIP PREMIERE TICKETS for our Los Angeles premiere party, where you'll join your humble servants and muscley heroes for the debut of the first new SUPER SHOW episode in years. Then, you'll hang out with the cast and creators at the private after-party!! SAVE ROOM FOR CAKE AND DIET COKES!!
*Shoot tentatively planned for Utah in Spring 2019. Travel & accommodations not included.
**Goldfish crackers subject to availability.
***We'll give you a producer credit and an awesome experience on set, but you won't actually be responsible for the episode. Doing work wouldn't be much of a reward.
PLUS... You'll get all of the rewards and benefits included in the $300 pledge level!
SHIPPING NOT INCLUDED. You'll be charged for shipping of any/all physical rewards after the campaign ends. See the FAQs for more details and estimated shipping costs!
INCLUDES:
Everything in the $300 Pledge Level!

The Aquabats will pick your group up in the Battletram, and you'll choose between fun activities** like karaoke, go-karting and mini-golf… and, of course, a pizza party. support.descp:
Ever wanted to break into show business? Well, at this reward level, it's time for your close-up! You'll get a crash course in acting from one of the "veteran television actors" in The Aquabats!, and then you'll ACT IN A SCENE WITH THE AQUABATS on an episode of "THE AQUABATS! SUPER SHOW!"*
One line? Two lines? Heck, stick around and be part of a whole scene!** It’s up to you and your phat acting skillz, homie! Plus, once you've been trained by the best actors on TV, you'll be ready to go make some mad bank as the star of your OWN show!
Plus, while you're on set, we'll give you the VIP treatment: You'll have your own Director's Chair, get an official cast gift, sit down for lunch with your fellow cast mates and the crew, and live like the star of stage and screen you're about to be.
You'll also be listed in the episode credits and on IMDB, and we'll even throw in TWO VIP TICKETS for our SEASON PREMIERE PARTY, where you'll join us for the first screening of your big scene. What more could you ask for?!
*Shoot tentatively planned for Utah in Spring 2019. Travel & accommodations not included.

support.descp:

That's right, friend: The Aquabats will WRITE & RECORD A PRIVATE EP ALBUM* JUST FOR YOU. It will be an official Aquabats album, complete with cover art, but who gets to hear it is up to you! Plus, you can help us come up with the song titles and lyrics if you want, since we're not always good at coming up with song ideas. Heck, you can even join us in the studio and PLAY on the album with us, if you want. After all, it's YOUR ALBUM!

support.title: The SUPER SECRET SHOW! (Private Episode)
support.descp:
KICKSTARTER DOES NOT ACCEPT PLEDGES ABOVE $25,000. CLAIMING THIS REWARD GIVES YOU THE EXCLUSIVE RIGHT TO CLAIM THIS REWARD FOR AN ADDITIONAL $225,000, IF YOU CHOOSE.
____
This might be the craziest offer The Aquabats will ever make.**
At this level, you'll work hand-in-hand with The Aquabats as we make A PRIVATE EPISODE OF "THE AQUABATS! SUPER SHOW!" JUST FOR YOU!***
Join our team to write a script based on whatever crazy ideas you can come up with. Then, work with director and show co-creators Jason deVilliers and Christian Jacobs in any role you create for yourself!***
Then, spend a couple days (or weeks) on set with The Aquabats, producing and shooting a PRIVATE EPISODE of "The Aquabats! Super Show!", JUST FOR YOU! It's an offer so crazy it's unheard of in this business... and we've heard it all!
Once we're done shooting, we'll have a CRAZY WRAP PARTY to celebrate our collaboration... and then, when we're done editing, we'll have a PRIVATE PREMIERE SCREENING for you and your friends! Maybe we can even get The Aquabats to play the afterparty! (HINT HINT!)
*This is a complicated one. If you're even a little bit serious about this, go check the FAQs for more details.
**It's not, actually. Check out the $10,000,000 reward. It's a little bit crazier.
***Specific length and details of the episode will be worked out between you and The Aquabats. You'll get to decide how we use the budget for your episode! See the FAQ for more details.
****Within legal and ethical boundaries.
PLUS... You'll get all of the rewards and benefits included in the $25,000 "Executive Producer" pledge level!
INCLUDES:
The Aquabats Create A Private Episode JUST FOR YOU!
Everything in the $25,000 Pledge Level!

support.title: The PRIME MINISTER OF AQUABANIA!
support.descp:
KICKSTARTER DOES NOT ACCEPT PLEDGES ABOVE $25,000. CLAIMING THIS REWARD GIVES YOU THE EXCLUSIVE RIGHT TO CLAIM THIS REWARD FOR AN ADDITIONAL $9,975,000, IF YOU CHOOSE.
____
You know what? We're going for it. At this level, you'll be a member of The Aquabats for life... but you'll also be so much more.
Together, we will FIND & BUY A PRIVATE ISLAND, RENAME IT AQUABANIA, INSTALL A NEW GOVERNMENT and YOU WILL BE THE FIRST PRIME MINISTER!
We're 100% serious. We'll select the island with you, handle all the paperwork, and set it up as the official homeland of The Aquabats. Then, along with you and your closest friends, The Aquabats will charter a boat and cruise out to the new island nation, where you'll be officially pronounced as the Prime Minister of Aquabania for the first three-year term.
You will also appear on a very special episode of "THE AQUABATS! SUPER SHOW!" in your new role as the Prime Minister of Aquabania. The episode will be shot on location in the new sovereign state of Aquabania. We will also agree to come visit you, hang out, and look for surf together at least twice a year for the duration of your first three-year term.
When your term is up, you'll have to be voted in as Prime Minister to continue in the role. Because, like.. democracy and stuff.
SO, KIDS... THINK BIG! WHY JUST MAKE A TV SHOW WHEN YOU COULD ALSO BECOME THE PRIME MINISTER OF A NEW NATION STATE?
Please do this. The Aquabats really want to see this happen, and look forward to serving in your Administration.
*This is a complicated one. If you're even a little bit serious about this, go check the FAQs for more details.
(PLUS, best of all... You'll get all of the rewards and benefits included in the $300 pledge level!)
INCLUDES:
Everything in the $300 Pledge Level!
Serve as Prime Minister of Aquabania
Pretty Much Any Other Reward You Want

campaign.story:
GLADSTONE'S SCHOOL FOR WORLD CONQUERORS BOOK 3: SCORPIO KANE
Own it today!
Gladstone's School for World Conquerors 3 continues the critically acclaimed young adult graphic novel series created by Armand Villavert and Mark Andrew Smith. Book 3 is lettered by Patrick Brosseau and colored by Jessie Lam. 
Clocking in at 200 pages and utilizing the original graphic novel format, Gladstone's 3 is the very definition of a page turner with a hundred page battle royale fight sequence.
That's right! A hundred page battle royale!  
This volume of Gladstone's School for World Conquerors is a love letter to Manga where we take our characters out onto the open road, ramp up the speed, and see just how fast they can go. 
Book 3 follows our band of Villains on their Cosmic Quest as they come across Scorpio Kane and his band of mercenary villains. On this adventure they're joined by new recruits 'the Speed Specter' and 'Man O' War.' 
Gladstone’s School for World Conquerors is a Young Adult Graphic Novel series by Armand Villavert & Mark Smith about a top-secret academy for the children of the world's greatest Super Villains to learn their trade.
Ever wondered if Super Villains go to school? Ah, you assumed they were born with their special skills. Think again, in Gladstone’s School for World Conquerors we find ourselves amidst the pinnacle of higher learning for the next generation of villains and masterminds honing their craft.
The school curriculum includes the usual suspects of “public speaking” and “biology and chemistry,” and yet that’s only superficial child’s play. Classes like “unleash your hypnotic potential”, “intergalactic battle strategy”, and “ancient relics, spells & mystical arts” are added stressors for straight-A students like Kid Nefarious and Mummy Girl.
Mock battles are unleashed to test their skills with the latest tools of the trade such as “orbs of tranquility” or “grim reaper’s breath.”
Join Kid Nefarious, Mummy Girl, Martian Jones, The Speed Spectre, Ghost Girl, Man O' War, and the infamous Skull brothers unearth the School's and their parent's hidden past.
Gladstone's School for World Conquerors is co-created and co-owned by Armand Villavert & Mark Andrew Smith.
GLADSTONE'S SCHOOL FOR WORLD CONQUERORS 1 & 2 HARDCOVERS
OWN THE THREE BOOK GLADSTONE'S SCHOOL FOR WORLD CONQUERORS SET TODAY!!!
PICK UP 'THE NEW BRIGHTON ARCHEOLOGICAL SOCIETY' 1 & 2 AS WELL AND SUPPORT GLADSTONE'S SCHOOL FOR WORLD CONQUERORS
Buy the New Brighton Archeological Society Today!!!
 Featuring new teammates the Speed Spectre and Man 'O War. 
What is this Kickstarting?
This Kickstarter is to pay for the printing costs of Gladstone's School for World Conquerors Book 3 in Hardcover format.
What is the plan for delivery?
We have book 3 laid out for production. This Kickstarter is to print Gladstone's School for World Conquerors 3 in Hardcover format. 
Gladstone's School for World Conquerors Books 1 and 2 are already printed in beautiful Hardcover format as well as New Brighton Archeological Society 1 and 2.
It should be about a four month wait for backers. The books will take about two months to be printed in China. A month and a half for freight to the US. About two weeks to arrive in Amazon's inventory, and another two weeks to ship out to backers.
See what people are saying about Gladstone's School for World Conquerors!!!
"Smith’s writing is fast-paced and warm, his characters rich enough to resonate with all ages of reader, and the character design and outsider edge of surreality recalls Peter Milligan‘s X-Statix, and likewise Villavert’s pen explores the same subverted pop-art style of Mike Allred, albeit with the stylised touch of a Saturday morning cartoon." - Sci Fi Now
"We've been championing Gladstone's by Mark Andrew Smith and Armand Villavert since issue #1, but the last couple of issues have seen the series hit an early stride. In this installment, Smith plays with an enticingly fun and interesting take on superhero comics, challenging the notion of a hero's constant victory of his nemesis and how that would affect a child that is being educated in the ways of villainy.
Watching Kid Nefarious and friends discover their parents losing over and over again in the pages of comic books (which are banned from Gladstone's, for these obvious reasons) is amazing. Gladstone's never talks down to kids and remains all-ages accessible. Better yet, they just might learn something about the tropes of superhero comics in the process.
Gladstone's continues to impress, so if you've been neglecting this series for some oddball reason, it's time to stop doing so. You're missing out, and everyone's going to make fun of you for it." - IGN
"Mark Andrew Smith and Armand Villavert’s tween superhero ongoing stood out as the kind of title Marvel or DC wish they had, but would never be possible at the Big Two. A superhero dramedy set at a school for aspiring supervillains, the series is founded on the concept that the ongoing war between heroes and villains is faked, putting a new spin on the parent-as-supervillain metaphor.
The students are waking up to the reality of their world, and the reader discovers with them, learning the dense mythology of Smith’s story while experiencing the thrill of Villavert’s kinetic artwork. Best of all, Gladstone’s is a title appropriate for all readers, with characters that look and sound like kids, but a plot that any superhero fan can appreciate." - AV CLUB
"Mark Andrew Smith’s tween-supervillain team is similar to the Runaways in that each member is pulled from a different corner of the superhero genre: a mummy, ghost, alien, etc. Smith’s story puts a new spin on the super-school concept that has already been tried in films like Sky High and Zoom. Armand Villavert’s sleek artwork would translate well to computer animation, and Smith’s clearly defined yet whimsical cast makes Gladstone’s a great fit for a studio like Pixar. The chance of a creator-owned superhero team launching a big-budget animated feature is slim, but if The Walking Dead can become the highest-rated show on cable, there’s always hope." - AV CLUB
ART FROM 'GLADSTONE'S SCHOOL FOR WORLD CONQUERORS: SCORPIO KANE' illustrated by Armand Villavert with colors by Jessie Lam.
Please take a moment to share 'Gladstone's School for World Conquerors' with your friends on Facebook and Twitter by clicking the 'Like' & 'Tweet' buttons above.
By sharing 'Gladstone's' you're helping us to educate the public about the project and helping us to get one step closer to our quest of 'world domination.'
'Gladstone's School for World Conquerors' TM & (C) Armand Villavert & Mark Andrew Smith.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Gladstone's School for World Conquerors 1 and 2 are printed. Book 3 is finished and ready to print. Because the printers are in China it will take two months to print, a month and a half for freight, a few weeks to get the books to Amazon.com which we are using for shipping and fulfillment for this Kickstarter, and about two weeks to deliver the books from Amazon.

*Disclaimer: The trailer was done a while ago and says 'Only on Kickstarter', it is not in any way exclusive to Kickstarter and may be sold later through diamond or Amazon.com at a higher retail price. For us Kickstarter is the prefered method of sale and we get more from every book sold through Kickstarter.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
